name: AllTrails, Inc.
description: Provider of an online platform designed to offer detailed and hand-curated trail maps for outdoor explorers. The online platform offers complete, accurate, global dataset for off-road recreation which are provided in a detailed, hand-curated trail maps and gives reviews, photos and information, enabling users to get the required information for their outings and record and share their experience with their family and friends.
